configuration Struct Reference

Contains configuration information. More...

#include <config.h>


Data Fields

char * output_filename
unsigned char free_output_filename
char * input_path
int32_t tile_x
int32_t tile_z

Detailed Description

Contains configuration information.

Populate this struct with parse_commandline_options(), described in config.h.

Additionally, be sure to call free_config() before the program terminates, or memory leaks will occur.

Field Documentation

unsigned char configuration::free_output_filename

Internal flag to tell whether or not output_filename should be freed.

char* configuration::input_path

Location of the directory containing the map chunks, as provided by the user.

char* configuration::output_filename

The name of the file which will hold the final rendered image. Will be autogenerated if missing.

int32_t configuration::tile_x

The X coordinate of the desired tile.

int32_t configuration::tile_z

The Z coordinate of the desired tile.
